title._content: [Union case for daguerreotype, ambrotype, or tintype showing eagle holding banner stating "Union Forever" in its beak and American flag in its talons] (LOC)

description._content: [Union case for daguerreotype, ambrotype, or tintype showing eagle holding banner stating "Union Forever" in its beak and American flag in its talons] [between 1852 and 1866] 1 item : thermoplastic ; 7.6 x 6.5 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff.
